</ul>

</ul>

Using the above sample code, program a CSS selector that sets the font size for all of the list items in lists with a class of speakers to 20px.

a {
  color: blue;
}
/* need visited, active and hover styles */

I need help styling some links. Program three CSS selectors:

  1. Selector 1: links that have been visited should be 2edb00.
  2. Selector 2: when a user hovers over a link, it should be 004da7.
  3. Selector 3: when a user clicks down on a link, it should be ffc700.
exercises.solution: a:visited { color: #2edb00; } a:hover { color: #004da7; } a:active { color: #ffc700; }

<ul>
  <li><a href="#">Home</a></li>
  <li><a href="#">Contact</a></li>
  <li><a href="#">Resume</a></li>
</ul>
ul li a {
  color: red; 
}

Based on the code above, program a CSS selector that will set the color of the first link in the list equal to blue, and the last link in the list equal to green.
exercises.solution: ul li:first-child a { color: blue; } ul li:last-child a { color: green; }
